page.description: Runs a Join operation without displaying a confirmation dialog box
page.syntax: C join.run_silent(C layoutname [,C master_table_filter [,C transaction_table_filter [,* arguments ]]])

argument.name: layoutname
argument.description: The name of a previously created join operation.

argument.name: master_table_filter
argument.description: Optional. Default = ".T." (All records). A character filter expression that evaluates to a logical value and selects the records from the master table.

argument.name: transaction_table_filter
argument.description: Optional. Default = ".T." (All records). A character filter expression that evaluates to a logical value and selects the records from the transaction table.

page.discussion: The JOIN.RUN_SILENT() method joins two tables using a previously defined join operation.
